ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Wake Up Call
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Yeah, but they should distribute the two more evenly. And the two songs I mentioned, identify and the magic weapon one, are laughable. They do not even
ygData.messageBody:
--- Christopher Sanders <christopher.sanders@...> wrote:
> Gotta have some utility songs, too...

Yeah, but they should distribute the two more evenly. And the two songs I
mentioned, identify and the magic weapon one, are laughable. They do not even
have utility.

=====
There are things in the Constitution that have been overtaken by events, by time...Inappropriate, anachronistic, it isn't done anymore...
-- Chairman Henry Hyde, who doesn't believe the Constitution needs to be followed or legally changed, just ignored.
